name: Observation (itch)
description:
Welcome to Oculum, the first virtual prison.

You've been trapped here for a long time. How long as it been exactly? It doesn't matter. You forget the concept of time when your  consciousness is trapped for all eternity in a machine. But something has changed. The inmates have gone missing and bugs started to appear in the frame that is this perfect prison. Maybe this is the time for an escape attempt. But beware the Oculants. If they catch you you'll be erased. Forever.

Observation is a fast action game where you play as an inmate in the first virtual prison Oculum. You have to escape through a hidden doorway and escape this eternal nightmare. But watch out for the Oculants. These things are still patrolling the prison even though it falls apart

Created by Mjeed & Paul
